topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d405606368726815500000#post_53d405606368726815500000
Just I woke up super not happy cuz there's some weird thing lodged in my right eye and I cant get it out, it fucking hurts, everytime I try to close my eyes it keeps stabbing my eyeball.

I couldn't even get to sleep, plus just thinking about life and such and what I'm gonna be doing with myself in the future so I was really stressed out.


And then wasting 8 hours of one of the last few days of my vacation on a stream that was boring as balls. and some other things.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d4050e6368720207070000#post_53d4050e6368720207070000
Thanks for caring man. :)
